title: [Large-Scale] Evidence-Based Learning (EBL) Approach to Innovate Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary medical terminology and fundamental concepts of human physiology
context.additional_context: Provides VR simulation environments for mastering standardized clinical decision-making processes. Comprises smartphone-accessible learning content

learning_goals: Learners can apply evidence-based decision-making processes with 80% accuracy in clinical scenario-based VR simulations
Learners can explain and visualize relationships between medical guidelines and algorithms in at least three ways through concept mapping
Learners can systematically present learning environment selection criteria in four or more stages using an organizational decision-making prototype algorithm

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
